Source.Name: babl
Source.Summary: babl is a dynamic, any to any, pixel format translation library.
Source.Description: It allows converting between different methods of storing pixels known as pixel formats that have with different bitdepths and other data representations, color models and component permutations. A vocabulary to formulate new pixel formats from existing primitives is provided as well as the framework to add new color models and data types.
